title: Critical Patch Update
extract: Critical Patch Update (CPU) now refers to the overall release of security fixes each quarter rather than the cumulative database security patch for the quarter. ... Patch Set Updates (PSU) are the same cumulative patches that include both the security fixes and priority fixes.
extract_html: Critical Patch Update (CPU) now refers to the overall release of security fixes each quarter rather than the cumulative database security patch for the quarter. ... Patch Set Updates (PSU) are the same cumulative patches that include both the security fixes and priority fixes.
